segments.text: I see the woman is drying dishes, she seems so focused on her task that she doesn't notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, creating such a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so daring and risky, climbing up on that unstable stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her cookie, she seems so eager and excited to get one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the beautiful garden outside through the open window, it's so peaceful and calm out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is in such disarray with the overflowing sink and the children climbing on stools, it's a real shame to see it like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over at any moment, someone should really help that boy before he falls and gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing in the puddle of water, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly on the counter, at least someone has been keeping things organized and tidy in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the children taking cookies without her permission anytime soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost full to the brim with delicious-looking cookies, they must have baked a lot of them recently.
segments.speaker: PAR
